title: At Avdiyivka direction Russian army shelled Novobakhmutivka, Berdychi, Semenivka, Pervomayske and Nevelske of Donetsk region....
content: At Avdiyivka direction Russian army shelled Novobakhmutivka, Berdychi, Semenivka, Pervomayske and Nevelske of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Ocheretyne, Novobakhmutivka, Semenivka, Karlivka of Donetsk region
author: Live UA Map
